aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro: Welcome! I am a developer who loves to create modern web applications using the latest technologies.
aboutMe.description: I specialize in React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, and I always look for ways to improve the user experience through clean code and modern design.
aboutMe.career.title: My Journey So Far
aboutMe.career.mania.description1: Developed and maintained websites and digital marketing campaigns for various clients.
aboutMe.career.mania.description2: Collaborated with the design team to transform creative concepts into functional, visually engaging websites.
aboutMe.career.mania.description3: Focused on responsive design, performance optimization, and a seamless user experience across all devices.
aboutMe.career.bondex.description1: Worked on the Bondex platform — a forward-thinking platform connecting professionals and companies through blockchain-powered networking and recruitment.
aboutMe.career.bondex.description2: Built and optimized interactive user interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks and REST API integrations.
aboutMe.career.bondex.description3: Collaborated with international teams to deliver scalable web solutions and improve the experience for global users in the tech and FinTech industries.
aboutMe.career.endava.description1: Contributed to multiple enterprise and internal projects, building responsive, scalable front-end solutions using React, Vue, Angular, and TypeScript.
aboutMe.career.endava.description2: Worked on applications ranging from data collection and visualization platforms to real-time communication tools and analytics dashboards for enterprise clients.
aboutMe.career.endava.description3: Focused on delivering user-centric interfaces, integrating with cloud services (AWS, Azure), and improving overall performance, accessibility, and maintainability.
aboutMe.career.endava.description4: Actively collaborated with cross-functional teams, UX/UI designers, and backend developers to ensure seamless integration and high-quality user experiences.
aboutMe.career.endava.description5: Participated in testing, code reviews, and performance optimization to maintain consistency and reliability across complex front-end architectures.
aboutMe.tools.title: My Toolbox of Tricks
aboutMe.tools.subtitle: The tech, tools, and platforms that bring my ideas to life (and sometimes mild chaos).
aboutMe.tools.frontend.title: Frontend & UI
aboutMe.tools.frontend.description: Where pixels meet logic — and sometimes argue about spacing.
aboutMe.tools.cloud.title: Cloud & DevOps
aboutMe.tools.cloud.description: Because even my code deserves a cloud to nap on.
aboutMe.tools.testing.title: Testing & Quality
aboutMe.tools.versionControl.title: Version Control & Tools
aboutMe.tools.versionControl.description: Keeping chaos organized, one commit at a time.
aboutMe.tools.design.title: Design & Prototyping
aboutMe.tools.design.description: Sometimes I trade semicolons for color palettes.
aboutMe.tools.projectManagement.title: Project Management & Methods
aboutMe.tools.projectManagement.descript: Because every great sprint needs snacks and structure.
aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.howItStarted.title: How It All Started
aboutProject.howItStarted.paragraph1: It started with coffee and curiosity.
aboutProject.howItStarted.paragraph2: What was meant to be a small test became a full end-to-end project! Now it powers SmartChat, the Cat Wheel of Fortune, and a few spontaneous ideas that somehow work.
aboutProject.techStack.title: Tech Stack (a.k.a. What Keeps It Alive)
aboutProject.techStack.description: This project runs on React for the frontend, styled with Tailwind CSS, and powered by Vite for fast development. The backend is built with Node.js, with Supabase handling authentication and data storage. Real-time communication is handled through WebSockets, and of course — the SmartChat AI keeps things interesting.
aboutProject.techStack.subtitle: Main technologies and tools:
aboutProject.features.title: Key Features
aboutProject.features.login.title: Login System
aboutProject.features.smartchat.title: SmartChat AI
aboutProject.features.smartchat.descript: A chatbot with a touch of personality and humor.
aboutProject.features.wheel.title: Cat Wheel of Fortune
aboutProject.features.wheel.description: Spin for random rewards, surprises, and chaos.
aboutProject.features.websocket.title: Real-time communication
aboutProject.features.websocket.descript: WebSockets make interactions instant and dynamic.
aboutProject.features.modular.title: Modular design
aboutProject.features.modular.descriptio: Clean, reusable React components for scalability.
aboutProject.features.responsive.title: Responsive UI
aboutProject.features.responsive.descrip: Built to look good on every screen (and it does).
aboutProject.docs.title: Documentation & Links
aboutProject.docs.subtitle: For those who like to dig deeper or browse through code (you brave soul):
